Hi,




Is it advisable to replicate the workflow for bsdfview in a 
non-interactive mode? I am working with a remote terminal window and 
would like to generate the default views for a series of xml files by 
iterating through them one at a time.  I managed to do so by copying the 
rif structure from the perl file for bsdfview and turning off the -o 
option.


Is there a reason why the non-interactive mode isn't a part of the 
functionality?




Thanks,


Sarith
